PuraKai Surf & Paddle.address: Autopista Tijuana Ensenada KM 73, Abelardo L. Rodriguez, | Marina Puerto Salina , La Salina , Ensenada Municipality 22765 , Mexico
reviewComments: We had lots of fun using their paddle boards. We did end up bending the handle and helping pay for a replacement, so just make sure not to paddle too hard.
